DOC.brief_summary: Protocol HECT00306 aim determine clinically appropriate dos Hectorol ( doxercalciferol capsule ) convert Zemplar ( paricalcitol injection ) treatment secondary hyperparathyroidism Stage 5 chronic kidney disease hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 4 Study Determine Dosing Hectorol® Capsules When Converting From Zemplar® Injection
DOC.criteria: The subject must receive hemodialysis three time per week minimum six month . The subject must receive Zemplar Injection minimum 3 month . The subject must stable dose regimen , three time per week administration minimum four week . The central laboratory assessment must within follow range : serum iPTH 150600 pg/mL , inclusive ; correct calcium < 10.0 mg/dL ; phosphorus < 7.0 mg/dL . In opinion Investigator , subject currently poorly control diabetes mellitus , poorly control hypertension , active vasculitis , HIV infection , clinically significant , unstable medical condition . Abnormal liver function measure ALT/AST great two time upper limit normal ( ULN ) . The subject currently malabsorption , severe chronic diarrhea , ileostomy . Any evidence active malignancy except basal cell carcinoma skin . A history malignancy exclusion .
